FuncDef: The reset mpls traffic-statistics ldp command deletes FEC traffic statistics.

ParaDef.Info:
Deletes FEC traffic statistics with the specified route prefix.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Deletes FEC traffic statistics with a specified route prefix mask length.
The value is fixed at 32.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before collecting statistics, run the reset mpls traffic-statistics ldp command to delete existing FEC traffic statistics.
Prerequisites
MPLS and MPLS traffic statistics collection are enabled globally.
Configuration Impact
After the reset mpls traffic-statistics ldp command is run, traffic statistics are deleted.
